Trustee_1_pre_3.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
Trustee_1_pre_3.content: Hiroshi Tanaka has demonstrated exceptional trustworthiness and competence throughout the investment process. He adhered to the agreed allocation plan and maintained transparency, reinforcing his reputation as a reliable trustee. His fair distribution of profits further highlights his pro-social behavior, solidifying his commitment to mutual benefit in investment activities. Overall, his reputation has improved significantly, reflecting his dedication to ethical investment practices.

Investor_1_pre_4.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
Investor_1_pre_4.content: I have demonstrated a strong commitment to integrity and fairness throughout the investment process. By engaging transparently with my trustee, I have fostered a collaborative environment that enhances mutual trust. I worked closely with Hannah Muller to ensure that our terms were beneficial for both parties and showed adaptability in discussions. Moving forward, I will continue to uphold this reputation of ethical engagement and aim to nurture productive relationships in my investment activities.

Trustee_1_pre_5.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
Trustee_1_pre_5.content: Hiroshi Tanaka has successfully established a strong reputation as a trustee by demonstrating trustworthiness, pro-sociality, and competence throughout the investment process. Adhering to the agreed profit allocation, he ensured a fair distribution of profits, which significantly enhanced his standing within the investment community. His proactive communication and transparency reflect a commitment to mutual benefit and ethical investment practices, leading to an overall positive reputation.
